definition: (ball game) enthusiast (player)/golf buddy (or tennis buddy etc)

sentences.english: The buddies start to wonder where he's been hiding the money.
sentences.chinese: 那些球友們開始懷疑他哪裏藏了這麼多錢。

sentences.english: Fast-swing players make up the majority of the avid golf population.
sentences.chinese: 揮杆速度偏快的球友已形成爲數衆多的高爾夫人口。

sentences.english: Wish you happy tennis that night.
sentences.chinese: 熱愛網球，希望結交更多各方球友。

sentences.english: What is more, skills are undemanding for these series rackets, which is quite fitting for juniors and beginners.
sentences.chinese: 非常適合廣大兒童和初學的青少年球友使用。

sentences.english: I'm excited to get to see the guys again.
sentences.chinese: 對於能再看到球友們，我感到很興奮。

sentences.english: Hope you will have time to play tennis together.
sentences.chinese: 熱愛網球，希望結交更多各方球友。

sentences.english: This is a high performing blade that can easily be used by any player of any level.
sentences.chinese: 這是一塊高性能底板，適用於任何級別的球友。

definition: table tennis/table tennis ball (Tw)/billiards/pool/snooker (HK, Singapore, Malaysia)
to watch a football game (or other ball game)/Fore! (golf)/Watch out for the ball!
club (golf)/cue (billiards)/also written 球桿|球杆[qiu2 gan1]
